fact: Over 1/3 of all food globally produced goes to waste
The annual value of food wasted globally is $1 trillion
25% of the world's fresh water supply is used to grow food that is never eaten
1/4 of wasted food could feed all 795 million undernourished people in the world
Half of all produce is thrown away in the US because it is too ‘ugly’ to eat. This amounts to 60 million tons of fruit and vegetables
The amount of food wasted annually weighs 1.3 billion tons
